Entered the issue description into the 'Write your issue here...' field. Successfully clicked the 'Upload Image' button. Successfully clicked the 'Choose from gallery' button. Successfully clicked the ImageView with resource-id 'icon_thumbnail'. ✅ Successfully clicked the 'Submit' button.
